details: Introduced by Drs. Lehman and Yingling. Not proved, hence clinical symptoms only but many have been verified. Sycotic remedy Anaphylactic states produced by proteins and enzymes (Yingling).

Head: Catarrhal discharge from posterior nares
Headache and sharp pains all over
Aching back of head and neck
Irritable and nervous
Sneezing and wheezing
Worse from constipation
Stomach: Sour, yeasty, mouldy odor from discharges
Belching of gas in stomach and abdomen
Extremities: Hands cold like ice and go to sleep easily
Backache, tired and weak from elbows and knees down

name: Torula cervisiae
dosage: Pure yeast cake or potencies from
